title: Final Boss Aurelion Sol
body: I'm calling it right now. In the near future ( I hope), there will be a final boss Aurelion Sol skin. Come on. We need dat dragon as our final "final" boss, no?

replies.body:
First day buy

I want it to be Ultimate skin and Ultimate Boss Aurelion Sol

It needs to change whenever he dies.

"This isn't even my final form!"

> [{quoted}](name=Scoroct,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zEVZpa3H,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-07T19:24:52.920+0000)
>
> and maybe Viktor?

Yes, definitely Battle Boss Viktor. Make him look like something out of Megaman X or something.


Ooh, and Final Boss Swain in the style of a Final Fantasy villain; his ult would even be his "one-winged angel" transformation.
copy right infringement. riot is scared to death of getting sued, thats why they never take chances.

> [{quoted}](name=Awhegark,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zEVZpa3H,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-08T04:22:05.878+0000)
>
> copy right infringement. riot is scared to death of getting sued, thats why they never take chances.

If they can make Arcade Ezreal look like Neku from The World Ends With You with no hassle, then I'm sure they could pull some of these off.

> [{quoted}](name=Tidal Tyrant,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=zEVZpa3H,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-07T16:26:49.094+0000)
>
> Raid boss Darius {{champion:122}} 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kz0YAzRWIQ0
> Some-sort-of-boss Gangplank {{champion:41}} because that AoE has some awesome potential 
> 
> Horror Game 'boss' Rengar {{champion:107}} 
> 
> {{champion:90}} new {{champion:83}} These 2 also deserve a boss skin of some sort.

Raid boss morde would be pretty good too.
I would love to see a Spooky Aurelion Sol with will-o-wisps circling him instead of stars
how about a "the End" skin for jhin in refference to mgs3?
But we already have a Final Boss, and you can't who two Final Bosses. However it would be great to get a boss skin for Aureliion. Also a raid boss Nasus skin would be awesome too.

It's basically Dragon Ball Z

You think the guy you just fought was the strongest, but he was actually a peon for Frieza
The orbiting pixels of doom, create glitches with his q, tear the game with his R. You didn't lag you just died.
I would instantly buy that. Awesome theme for my favorite champ.
There can't be 2 final bosses.  Maybe a DLC boss tho.
